name: Outerbase Studio
title: outerbase.com
shortDescription: Outerbase Studio is a versatile database GUI client supporting multiple database systems like SQLite, MySQL, and Postgres. It allows users to manage databases directly from a desktop app or via command line. Ideal for developers and database administrators, the tool simplifies data manipulation, query organization, and schema editing. Users can benefit from features like a powerful data editor, query notebooks, and structured query saving, making it suitable for both small projects and enterprise-level operations.
pros: Advanced query and schema editing features
cons: May require technical knowledge to use effectively
Desktop app might not be suitable for all users
